  • Projects

    • Introduction
    • Configuration
      • Create New Project
      • Add Existing Project
      • Commands
        • create_project
        • delete_project

    # Commands

    # create_project

    HINT

    The create_project command will automatically generate .pxl-vagrant/config.yaml file from user input.

    # Interactive

    ...

    # Noninteractive

    # New

    create_project \
    --dir=my-project/ \
    --php=7.3 \
    --db-name=my_project \
    --db-driver=mysql

    # Existing

    create_project \
    --git-repo=git@github.com:x/x.git
    --dir=my-project/

    # delete_project

    # Interactive

    ...

    # Noninteractive

    # Options

    • --dir (Project directory)
    • --delete-files (Delete project files)
    • --delete-db (Delete database)
    delete_project \
    --dir=my-project/ \
    --delete-files \
    --delete-db

    ← Add Existing Project
